name: A Ressha de Ikou 3 Super Version
summary: A Ressha de Ikō III also known as AIII S.V.: A-Ressha de Ikou 3 Super Version for the Super Famicom version is the third installment of the A-Train series. Originally released for the personal computers in Japan in 1990, it was later ported to other gaming systems such as the PC-Engine CD in 1993 as well for the Super Famicom in 1995. So far, only the PC-Engine CD version as re-released for the Wii Virtual Console.
